Sentencas: This paper studies the thermodynamic aspects of direct ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cells (DA-SOFC).
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this regard, anode-supported oxygen ion-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC-O) and proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC-H) fuelled with ammonia are compared on the basis of their thermodynamic and electrochemical performances at open and closed circuit conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Based on the thermodynamic equilibrium, full conversion of ammonia is attained at a temperature of 700 K and atmospheric pressure.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: From the results of this study, it is found that the overall performance of the fuel cell is largely dependent on critical factors such as the operating temperature and the properties of the electrolyte and electrodes layers.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On average, the peak power density of ammonia-fed SOFC-H is 20-30% higher than its SOFC-O counterpart under most examined conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This is mainly attributed to the higher concentration of hydrogen at the anode of SOFC-H in all cases.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cells
